mapper.select: select t.id, t.parent_id, t.name as title, (case when t.status = 2 then 'disabled' end) as type, (IF((select count(1) from sys_role where parent_id = t.id) > 0, 'false', 'true')) as isLeaf from sys_role t where t.parent_id = #{parentId} order by t.order_no
select t.id,t.name as title,t.parent_id from sys_role t where t.status = #{status} order by t.order_no
select t.id,t.parent_id,t.name,t.code,t.status,p.name as p_name,t.remarks from sys_role t left join sys_role p on p.id = t.parent_id where t.id= #{id}
select permission_id from sys_role_permission rp where rp.role_id = #{id}

select t.id,t.name,t.order_no from sys_role t where t.parent_id = #{parentId} order by t.order_no
limit #{str},#{length}
select t.id, t.parent_id,t.name as title from sys_role t where t.name like #{title} order by t.parent_id,t.order_no
select ifnull(max(order_no), 0) from sys_role t where t.parent_id = #{parentId}

select t.id, t.code, t.name, t.remarks from sys_role t
